name: CCF by Ntamas (Custom Cursor Follower by Ntamas)
author: Manolis Ntamadakis

sections.description: A Wordpress plugin to add an icon that will follow your cursor.
sections.installation: Click the activate button and that's it.
sections.changelog:
v1.0.5 released on October 24, 2024

v1.0.4 released on October 21, 2024

Feature:

v1.0.3 released on October 18, 2024

Feature:

  • Change Icon
  • Change the Speed
  • Change the place of the
